I had the weirdest dream last night.  I was at a house I'd never been to before but I knew them for some reason.  So there was this party & this hot guy walked up to me & asked me to dance.  I didn't know who it was at first but as we were dancing I realized it was Rich.  I wanted to pull away b/c in my dream I was married too.  But I couldn't leave.  The next thing I know I was in bed w/ him  & we had had sex.  James walks in & we're still in bed together.  Well James gets pissed & I didn't care.  After James stormed out I woke up.  Now I feel so weird around him.  What the hell?!?  Maybe it was the interesting convo that Rich & I had lastnight.  Maybe its b/c we talked some unfinished business out lastnight.  I feel a lot better the way things ended between us now that I know why, but  I still hate the fact that we might've still been together had certain assholes hadn't interfeared.  Oh well  I love James & I can't think 'what if' & not long for what could have been.  If Rich & I were together now  Would I have Kalin?  Would I have some other baby?  Oh well I'm happy w/ my life & don't want to change it for the world! :-)

FRIDAY NIGHT:
    We dropped kalin off at James's parents & then hung out there for a while.  August (Lindsie's boyfriend)  had a Halo pary & James I were invited so we went to that.  We arrived there around 5pm & was one of the first ones there.  Of course it's Indiana & it snows from November to April so there was a lot of snow that I got into my shoe b/c  My shoes only some up to my ankles & of course dumb me wore ankle socks so the snow got into them too.  I spent the evening w/ my sister & her bf  & 12 other boys that all were under the age of 18.  God did I feel old! *LOL*  So after about 5 1/2 hours of this I was bored out of my mind &  it smelled in the basement, I talked James into leaving & going back to our house ofr a quickie.  Since Kalin wasn't there it really wasn't a quickie (Thank God!).  Afterwards we headed back to James's parents, in Valories car, b/c ours didn't have gas.  We got there, Kalin was asleep so we went to be for the night.

SATURDAY:
    We get up & I took a shower.  After we got Kalin around & waited for James's aunts to arrive  & left for Indy around 11:30am.  We get to Marion & decide we're hungary (Valorie, James, & I)  So we stopped at Arby's (yum!).  James's Dad, Aunts, & uncle were in one car us in another, well they kept on going after we stopped so we didn't care.  After eating we joked about changing Kalin & then she peed on James so we really DID need to change her.  So after changing we get back on the road & spend the other 1 1/2 hours on the road.  Finally we get to James's Grandma Ware's house & his dad has beaten us there (big surprise).  WE hang out for a few minutes & his parents play dominoes, James plays the DS & Kalin & I found other things to do.  Finally, after several hours, we eat & watch Kalin devour a whole pickle.  After eating we sat down & I got Kalin to finally sleep after being awake all day.  So we watch Madagascar  & leave to James's Grandpa Gibson's house.  We get there around 9pm  & are awkae until midnight when we FINALLY get Kalin to bed.  After spending the night on a full size bed w/ a baby taking over the whole thin I got SOME sleep.

SUNDAY:
    We have a wonderful breakfast & wait to hear from other Family members to see when they might show up.  After waiting a few hours they make it before their parents do & we hang out until lunch time.  We have the typical Christmas dinner of ham & shit like that.  Then open gifts & gift cards from family members.  Kalin got 3 stuffed toys, 2 made noise, & 2 baby gates.  I got $50 gift cards to Best Buy  & a $10 to Meijer.  All in all it was a good day.  We left around 3pm &  I fell asleep before we got onto any major highway  & wake up to us pulling in the drive so I didn't have to sit there bored throughout the whole ride home.  We get to his parents & then we went shopping at Best Buy.  We Came home & now I get the whole evening to myself.

Ever wonder if there's only one person in the world for you?  What if there was more than one?  What would you do?  I feel like there may have been another person on this earth that was meant for me, but that relationship has come & gone.  The person who I spent the shortest amount of time w/ was the one person who really stuck in my heart.  Don't get me wrong I'm VERY happy to spend the rest of my life w/ James, but I know in my heart  that there was some one else for me.  I think even now I love him but I'm not willing to throw it all away on the chance that I won't be happy w/ him.  Does that make sense?  To me it does.  I love James I can't picture my life w/o that man in my life he is the one for me even if he weren't my hearts desire...........

What if he only married me b/c of that?  If I hadn't miscarried would we be happier today?   If I hadn't gotten pregnant in the first place would we still be together today?  We've attempted to 'make love' twice in 10 days which is less than last week.  It's getting to be more & more time in between each time.  I'm starting to feel less & less attractive to him or anyone.  Am I that bad to be with???  I try to be happy, I really do.  All day he's been distant. Sometimes I wonder how I could love a man so much & the next I wonder why.  James is my whole world  I don't think I could ever love another human being as much as I love him.  But there are times in our relationship that I wonder what made me love him in the first place.  We argue about anything but make up just as easily as we had gotten into the argument.  I can want to strangle him one minute & kiss him the next.  I can't see myself w/o him later on in life.  He's my whole world I know if he died I'd die of a broken heart but there are times, when I'm VERY MAD at him that I wonder what it'd be like to marry someone else.  He makes me feel like the most beautiful woman on this planet & lets me know that I'm loved deeply.  He also can push my buttons just right that I threaten to leave, he knows if I ever got mad enough that I would.  I just don't know how I'd survive w/o him if I did.  Sometimes when I look at him, I have the most overwhelming feeling of love that I can't express it.  Even now it's hard to say.  I love you James.
